description:
Approval of Details pursuant to condition 4 of planning permission reference: 
P2023/3036/FUL, dated:14/12/2023 DEVELOPMENT: Replacement single-glazed timber windows and doors with double-glazed timber windows and doors PLAN NOS: TQ2985NE Site Location Plan; Proposed Front Elevation; Proposed North East Elevation; W1 and W2 Window Details; Door Detail & Sustainable Design and Construction Statement. CONDITIONS: 1 3 YEAR CONSENT PERIOD: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission. REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5). 2 DRAWING AND DOCUMENT NUMBERS: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: TQ2985NE Site Location Plan; Proposed Front Elevation; Proposed North East Elevation; W1 and W2 Window Details; Door Detail & Sustainable Design and Construction Statement. Application Type: Full Planning Application Date of Application: 19 October 2023 Application Received: 19 October 2023 Application Valid: 06 November 2023 Application Target: 01 January 2024 P-DEC-AP1 REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning. 3 MATERIALS (COMPLIANCE): The development shall be constructed in accordance with the schedule of materials noted on the approved plans and within the application form. The development shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the details so approved and shall be maintained as such thereafter. REASON: In the interest of securing sustainable development and to ensure that the resulting appearance and construction of the development is of a high standard. 4 WINDOWS (COMPLIANCE): All new windows shall be painted timber and the glazing shall be no greater t
